column2: Mindfulness of dhammas as described in the Satipaṭṭhāna Sutta (MN 10) encompases the [Five Hindrances](tag:Hindrances), [Five Aggregates](tag:Aggregates), [Six Sense Bases](tag:Six Sense Bases), [Seven Factors of Awakening](tag:Factors of Awakening) and the [Noble Eightfold Path](tag:Eightfold Path). Ajahn Pasanno, Ajahn Karuṇadhammo, and Ajahn Jotipālo take turns reading suttas and teachings about these subjects.

column6: Kor Wat as a Basis for Practice
